original_title: Tally of those registered for Fuel Pass QR Code tops 6.5 mn
original_body_lines: The number of members registered with the National Fuel Pass QR Code has reached 6.5 million as of today, the Power and Energy Ministry said.
They said 1,000,000 persons were registered with the QR code facility within 24 hours after the system was introduced.
One year has been completed since the introduction of the system. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
